quotes.quote: I came to parenting the way most of us do — knowing nothing and trying to learn everything.
quotes.author: Mayim Bialik

quotes.quote: Everyone should have kids. They are the greatest joy in the world. But they are also terrorists. You’ll realize this as soon as they’re born, and they start using sleep deprivation to break you.
quotes.author: Ray Romano

quotes.quote: Encourage and support your kids because children are apt to live up to what you believe of them.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: Parenting without a sense of humor is like being an accountant who sucks at math.
quotes.author: Amber Dusick

quotes.quote: I don’t think it matters how many parents you’ve got, as long as those who are around make their presence a good one.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: Behind every young child who believes in himself is a parent who believed first.
quotes.author: Matthew Jacobson

quotes.quote: Affirming words from moms and dads are like light switches. Speak a word of affirmation at the right moment in a child’s life and it’s like lighting up a whole roomful of possibilities.
quotes.author: Gary Smalley

quotes.quote: The way we talk to our children becomes their inner voice.
quotes.author: Peggy O’Mara

quotes.quote: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Adams

quotes.quote: Biology is the least of what makes someone a mother.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I don’t know what’s more exhausting about parenting: the getting up early, or acting like you know what you’re doing.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: My worst parenting moments, the ones I am least proud of, happened because I was trying to impress a bunch of strangers I’ll probably never see again.
quotes.author: Janel Mills

quotes.quote: Being a mother is learning about strengths you didn’t know you had, and dealing with fears you didn’t know existed.
quotes.author: Linda Wooten

quotes.quote: If you bungle raising your children, I don’t think whatever else you do matters very much.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.quote: To raise a child, it sometimes takes a village…but sometimes that village should shut up and mind their own business.
quotes.author: Susan McLean

quotes.quote: The best kind of parent you can be is to lead by example.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Parenthood…it’s about guiding the next generation and forgiving the last.
quotes.author: Peter Krause
